title: Google\Cloud\VideoIntelligence\V1\TextSegment
name: TextSegment
description:
Video segment level annotation results for text detection.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.videointelligence.v1.TextSegment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.segment
params.description: Video segment where a text snippet was detected.

params.name: data.confidence
params.description: Confidence for the track of detected text. It is calculated as the highest over all frames where OCR detected text appears.

params.name: data.frames
params.description: Information related to the frames where OCR detected text appears.
